law.catch_line: Cooperation of state agencies -- Access to state and local government records.

text.section: All departments, agencies, officers and employees of the Commonwealth shall cooperate with the commission and its employees in carrying out its functions under KRS 146.410 to 146.530.

The director duly appointed by the commission or any employee authorized by the director shall, for purposes of KRS 146.410 to 146.530, have complete and timely access to all records of every agency, division or department of state, county or city government within the Commonwealth. Nothing in this section shall be construed to permit the commission to disclose those matters which by law are required to be kept confidential.
